item.title: Stream Live Coding With Twitch
item.description: Why Livestream? So far Twitch streaming's gotten a good 50 people to check out this book project. Livestreaming seems primarily popular among gamers but there is a growing niche for programming-oriented livestreams. I’m more into programming than gaming at this point in my life, so that’s what I’m streaming. Returning readers will already know about my upcoming book for the Pragmatic Programmers publishing company on chatbots.
